Summary: observed cylinder white object hovering at approx 13000 feet above hurricane ut for approx 2 min then shot off to the east very fast
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard killing hornet nests when I noticed an extremely big cylinder shaped object hovering above at 13000 feet is my best guess I stood in amazement and thought to get my camera but it shot off to the east faster than any thing iv ever seen in my life it went from mid sky to horizon in a blink right after a plane went by in the same direction but it appeared to be a commercial jet
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hurricane
There were no other sightings in Hurricane on or around July 27th 2012
